comment._content: I'm guessing it is etched into the back of the glass...the reversed printing in white on the upper right corner reads; "No. 2 5/17/11"

comment.author: 31676556@N04
comment._content: Belmont's Farm is described in this New York Times article from 1911 March 05: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=980DE7DE1431E233A... The farm was ~200 acres on Long Island. It was not, as one might suppose, a home for "wayward women" or delinquents, but a place to learn a real trade.

comment._content: Beautiful. Hi, I'm an admin for a group called People love their Work, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
